definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: ten (NH = BH; perh. MI:33 [[עשרַ]]; Ph. [[עשר]], [[עסר]], [[עשרת]], etc.; Ar. 9a4ra, 9a4arah;un; Sab. [[עשר]] Sab Denkm:No. 11 b, l. 5, 6, [[עשרת]] and cpds. Hom:Chrest. 48; Eth. 9a3ru: 9a3artu:; As. esûertu; Targum [[עֲסַר]], [[עַסְרָא]]; [[עֲשַׂר]], [[עַשְׂרָא]]; Syr. 9sar, ; Nab. [[עשר]], all = ten;; Palm. [[עשרתא]] the Ten (rulers));—
a ten, only f.pl. tens in phr. ´[[שָׂרֵי ע]] captains of tens Ex 18:21, Ex 18:25 (E), De 1:15.
ten, enumerating pers. or things, usually without other num.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[עֶ֫שֶׂר]] bef. n.f.pl., Ge 45:23 + 43 t. after n. † 1Ki 7:27, 1Ki 7:43 + late passages Jos 15:57, Jos 21:5, Jos 21:26 (all P), 1Ch 6:46, 2Ch 4:7; bef. [[בָּאַמָּה]] = ten cubits † 1Ki 6:3, 1Ki 6:25, 1Ki 6:26, 1Ki 7:23, 1Ki 7:24.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[עֲשָׂרָה]] bef. n.m.pl., Ge 45:23 + 25 t. (incl. [[אֲלָפִים]] ´[[ע]] = 10,000 2Sa 18:3, 2Ki 24:14 Kt, [[עֲשֶׂרֶת]] Qr); bef. n.coll. [[בָּקָר]] 1Ki 5:3, [[רֶכֶב]] 2Ki 13:7; also [[לֶחֶם הַוֶּה]] ´[[ע]] 1Sa 17:17 these ten loaves, cf. 1Ki 14:3; [[אֶלֶף]] ´[[ע]] Ez Eze 45:1 rd. ´[[עֶשְׂרִיס א]] LXX Hi Co Berthol Toy; after n.m.pl. † Ge 32:16, Ge 32:16, Ge 43:3 (all E), Jos 17:5 (JE), Nu 29:23 (P), 1Ki 7:43, 2Ch 4:6, 2Ch 4:8, Da 1:12, Da 1:14, Da 1:15 †; after n.coll. [[חאׁן]] 2Ch 30:24; n. om., sc. men, † Ge 18:32 (J) Am 5:3, Ezr 8:4; sc. shekels (weight) Ge 24:22 (J) Nu 7:14 + 13 t. Nu 7 ([[זׇהָב]] ´[[ע]]); [[כֶסֶף]] ´[[ע]] (sc. shekels, value) 2Sa 18:11; sc. measures (of grain) Hag 2:16; c. art. the ten Ge 18:23 (J; sc.men), Ne 11:1 (id. = every ten); as pred. Ex 27:12, Ex 27:12 = Ex 38:12, Ex 38:12 (all P) †.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עֲשֶׂ֫רֶת]] bef. n.m.pl. Ex 34:28 + 18 t., + [[כַּעֲשֶׂרֶת הַיׇּמִים]] 1Sa 25:38 (on art. cf. Weir in Dr, but dub.; prob. om., so LXX We Bu), + [[אֲלָפִים]] ´[[ע]] = 10,000 Ju Jdg 1:4 + 26 t.; n. om. [[כֶּסֶף]] ´[[ע]] (sc. shekels) Ju Jdg 17:10. †

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[עֶשֶׂר]] after larger num., [[מֵאָה]] [[שָׁנִים]] ´[[וׇע]] Ge 50:22, Ge 50:26, Jos 24:29 (all E), Ju Jdg 2:8.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ´[[ע]] before larger num. [[עֶשֶׂר שָׁנִים וּתְשַׁע מֵאוֹת שָׁנׇה]] Ge 5:14 (P).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עֲשָׂרָה]] after larger num., [[מֵאָה]] [[וַעֲשָׂרָה הַזְּכָרִים]] Ezr 8:12, cf. (n. preceding) Ezr 1:10.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[עֲשָׂרָה]] after smaller num., [[הַכָָּסֶף שִׁבְעָה שְׁקָלִים וַעֲשָׂרָה]] Je 32:9 = seventeen shekels; before smaller num. + n. sg. [[עֲשָׂרָה וַחֲמִשָּׁה שֶׁקֶל]] Ez Eze 45:12, but rd. [[חֲמִשִּׁים]] joining [[עֲשָׂרָה]] to preceding, LXX:A Hi Co al.
